answers.answer: Extreme Thirst Could be a sign of gestational diabetes, mention it at your next appt, but low blood pressure could be low iron count. Defo worth ringing your dr for both.

question: Hi, 20 weeks & so thirsty,  can't get enough liquid atm it's ridiculous,  low blood pressure and very tired this week,  any one else?
title: Extreme thirst & low blood pressure
